00002 #define MSG_ALERT 502
00003 #define MSG_WARNING 503
00004 #define YES_NO 401
00005 #define OK 402

00020         int handle_onload()
00021                 {
00022                 if(_type == MSG_ALERT)
00023                 {
00024                 int poly[8]={15,15,5,30,25,30,15,15};
00025                 setfillstyle(1,14);
00026                 fillpoly(4,poly);
00027                 }
00028                 }
00029         int handle_event_onclick(object *obj)
00030                 {
00031                 if(obj == ok)
00032                 {
00033                         stat=ID_OK;
00034                         return UNLOAD_CWIN;
00035                 }
00036                 else if(obj == yes)
00037                 {
00038                         stat=ID_YES;
00039                         return UNLOAD_CWIN;
00040                 }
00041                 else if(obj == no)
00042                 {
00043                         stat=ID_NO;
00044                         return UNLOAD_CWIN;
00045                 }
00046                 }

00050         msgbox(char * text, int type,int op=OK)
00051                 {
00052 
00053                 int _len = strlen(text)*8 ;
00054 
00055                 width = _len+55;
00056                 if(width < 150)
00057                         width = 150;
00058                 height = 80;
00059                 x=320-(width / 2 );
00060                 y=200;
00061 
00062 
00063         if(type == MSG_INFO)
00064                 strcpy(title," Information ");
00065         else if(type == MSG_ALERT)
00066                 strcpy(title," Alert ");
00067         else if(type == MSG_WARNING)
00068                 strcpy(title," Warning ");
00069         else
00070                 strcpy(title," Message Box ");
00071 
00072                 _type=type;
00073                 message= new label(25,10,_len+8,10,text);
00074                 attach(message);
00075                 if(op == OK)
00076                         {
00077                         ok= new button(width/2-15,40,40,20," OK ");
00078                         attach(ok);
00079                         }
00080                 else
00081                         {
00082                         yes= new button(width/2-15-40,40,50,20," Yes ");
00083                         attach(yes);
00084                         no= new button(width/2-15+40,40,40,20," No ");
00085                         attach(no);
00086                         
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089         };
00090         static int messagebox(char * messag, int type = MSG_INFO,int op=OK)
00091                 {               //op for yes/no or ok box
00092                 int ret=0;
00093                 msgbox *model;
00094                 model = new msgbox (messag,type,op);
00095         model->run();
00096                 ret=model->stat;
00097                 delete model;
00098                 return ret;
00099
